alert.note: Alert for Butte; Haakon; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 05 at 12:59AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of South Dakota, including the following areas, Butte, Haakon, Harding, Northern Black Hills, Northern Foot Hills, Northern Meade Co Plains, Perkins, Southern Meade Co Plains, Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and Ziebach. Portions of Wyoming, including the following areas, Northeastern Crook and Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and isolated thunderstorms are expected through this afternoon. While precipitation amounts will be highly variable, an additional one to three inches of rain are possible. Runoff from this heavy rainfall may lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Haakon; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach
